meta.description: Determine the optimal number of mangos and guavas to sell to maximize profit under budget and sales constraints.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits sold by the food truck.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each fruit.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each fruit.

vars.name: sold
vars.description: Number of each type of fruit sold.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling mangos and guavas.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total spending on fruits must not exceed $20000.

constraints.name: mango_minimum_sales
constraints.description: At least 100 mangos must be sold.

constraints.name: mango_maximum_sales
constraints.description: At most 150 mangos can be sold.

constraints.name: guava_maximum_sales
constraints.description: The number of guavas sold must not exceed a third of the mangos sold.
